articles.author: Kana Inagaki, Tim Bradshaw, Nicholas Megaw, Qianer Liu, Tabby Kinder
articles.title: Nvidia in talks to be an anchor investor in Arm IPO - Financial Times
articles.description: World’s most valuable semiconductor group discusses acquiring stake in SoftBank-owned chip designer ahead of New York listing
articles.content: Chip designer Arm is in talks to bring in Nvidia as an anchor investor while the SoftBank-owned company presses ahead with plans for a New York listing as soon as September, said several people brief… [+3837 chars]
